vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκρο-ᾱτήριον, τό,
place of audience, [NT]; lecture-room, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II audience, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: audience room (of the procurator), in which hearings were held and justice was privately dispensed
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
audience room (of the procurator), in which hearings were held and justice was privately dispensed
a place of audience, Acts 25:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 一個設作公聽及決斷事情的地方(徒 25:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 一个设作公听及决断事情的地方(徒 25:23)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phòng xử nghe; phòng xử án.
